Color codes
===========

### Foreground

| Code         | Color 				|
|--------------|--------------------|
| \033[22;30m" | - black            |
| \033[22;31m" | - red              |
| \033[22;32m" | - green			|
| \033[22;33m" | - brown 			|
| \033[22;34m" | - blue 			|
| \033[22;35m" | - magenta  		|
| \033[22;36m" | - cyan   			|
| \033[22;37m" | - gray 			|
| \033[01;30m" | - dark gray        |
| \033[01;31m" | - light red    	|
| \033[01;32m" | - light green      |
| \033[01;33m" | - yellow 			|
| \033[01;34m" | - light blue 		|
| \033[01;35m" | - light magenta    |
| \033[01;36m" | - light cyan       |
| \033[01;37m" | - white  			|


### Background

| Code         | Color 			
|--------------|--------------------|
| \e[22;40m" | - black 				|
| \e[22;41m" | - red 				|
| \e[22;42m" | - green 				|
| \e[22;43m" | - brown 				|
| \e[22;44m" | - blue 				|
| \e[22;45m" | - magenta 			|
| \e[22;46m" | - cyan	 			|
| \e[22;47m" | - gray	     		|
| \e[01;40m" | - dark gray			|
| \e[01;41m" | - light red			|
| \e[01;42m" | - light green		|
| \e[01;43m" | - yellow				|
| \e[01;44m" | - light blue 		|
| \e[01;45m" | - light magenta 		|
| \e[01;46m" | - light cyan 		|
| \e[01;47m" | - white 				|
